title: Position OwnerPhoto widget at bottom-right corner

requirements.text: Move the OwnerPhoto floating widget so it is fixed at the bottom-right corner of the viewport. It must not overlap or conflict with the FloatingWhatsApp button — place it directly above the WhatsApp button (e.g., bottom-24 right-4) so both are visible and separated. The circular photo, glow ring, and name label must all remain intact.

quotes: This place buttom right side owner photo

acceptanceCriteria: The OwnerPhoto component is fixed to the bottom-right corner of the screen on all viewport sizes.
The OwnerPhoto does not overlap the FloatingWhatsApp button — there is clear vertical separation between the two.
The circular owner photo, glow ring, and name label are fully visible and not clipped.
The widget remains in the bottom-right on mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes.

constraints: Do not remove or modify the FloatingWhatsApp component.
Do not alter the owner photo image, glow ring style, or name label content.
nonGoals: Adding new sections or features to the page.
